Latest revision as of 15:28, 25 May 2024
The following weapons appear in the video game Joint Task Force:
Pistols
M9 Beretta
The
[Beretta M9](/wiki/Beretta_M9) is seen in many cutscenes, and in the Main Menu background.
Submachine Guns
Heckler & Koch MP5A2
The
[Heckler & Koch MP5A2](/wiki/Heckler_%26_Koch_MP5A2) is the weapon of JTF Medic, pilot and Colombian leader, although they have an M16A2 on his HUD icon.
Heckler & Koch MP5SD
The
[Heckler & Koch MP5SD](/wiki/Heckler_%26_Koch_MP5SD) with red dot sight is commando´s weapon odd choice.
Rifles / Carbines
M16A2
The
[M16A2](/wiki/M16A2) is the standard issue rifle for Rangers, also used by Colombian Army and guerrillas.
M4A1
The
[M4A1](/wiki/M4A1) is the standard rifle O´Connel and Oakley. The Commando is shown with a M4 on the HUD icon, but is modeled with an MP5.
M4 with M203 Grenade Launcher
An M4 Carbine with attached
[M203 grenade launcher](/wiki/M203_grenade_launcher) is the main weapon of O´Connel and few rangers in Cutscenes.
FAMAS
The
[FAMAS](/wiki/FAMAS) is the standard rifle for Engineer and Tank Crew class.
IMI Romat
The
[FAL "Romat"](/wiki/FN_FAL#IMI_Romat) is used by colombian and somalian guerrillas.
AK-47
The
[AK-47](/wiki/AK-47) is the weapon of almost all OPFOR soldiers, excluding sniper and support.
AK-47 without stock
[AK-47s](/wiki/AK-47) without stock are used by most Opfor leaders.
SKS rifle
The
[SKS rifle](/wiki/SKS_rifle) is used by Afghan terrorist leader and by Bosnian and Somali militiamen.
Sniper Rifles
SVD Dragunov
The
[SVD Dragunov](/wiki/SVD_Dragunov) is Opfor sniper´s weapon of choice.
Galil Sniper Rifle
The
[Galil Sniper Rifle](/wiki/Galil_Sniper_Rifle) is seen on Colombian and JTF sniper´s HUD icon.
Heckler & Koch MSG-90
The
[Heckler & Koch MSG-90](/wiki/Heckler_%26_Koch_MSG-90) is used by JTF and Colombian Army snipers, although they both have Galil sniper on their HUD icon.
Machine Guns
PKM
The
[PKM](/wiki/PKM) is used by Opfor support guy, although he has AK-47 on his HUD icon.
M60E4
The
[M60E4 machine gun](/wiki/M60E4) is seen in hands of Colombian support gunners, JTF Engineer officers and warlord Akil Farrah. There is also unused JTF support gunner in game's editor files.
Launchers
RPG-7
[RPG-7](/wiki/RPG-7) is standard OpFor anti-tank weapon in game.
Carl Gustav M3 MAAWS
[Carl Gustav M3 Medium Anti-Armor Weapons System](/wiki/Carl_Gustav_recoilless_rifle) is JTF standard anti-tank weapon. Incorrectly named "AT-4".
FIM-92 Stinger
[FIM-92A Stinger](/wiki/FIM-92A_Stinger) is standard Anti-Air missile for JTF faction during the game.
SA-7 Grail
[SA-7 Grail](/wiki/SA-7_Grail) (Russian: 9K32 Strela-2) is OpFor counterpart of FIM-92.
Mounted Weapons
NSV Heavy Machine Gun
The
[NSV](/wiki/NSV) is seen mounted on various Soviet-origin vehicles.
Browning M2HB Heavy Machine Gun
The
[Browning M2HB](/wiki/Browning_M2HB) is seen mounted on various JTF vehicles.
Mk 19 Grenade Launcher
[Mk 19 grenade launcher](/wiki/Mk_19_grenade_launcher) can be spotted mounted on the JTF Humvee.
BGM-71 TOW
The
[BGM-71 TOW](/wiki/BGM-71_TOW) can be spotted mounted on the JTF Humvee.
ZU-23-2
The
[ZU-23-2](/wiki/ZU-23) appears in game many times as the standard static AA Defense.
M134 Minigun
The
[M134](/wiki/M134) is on almost all JTF helicopters. Primary weapon of the AH-6 Littlebird.
